text: وَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّمَآ أَمۡوَٰلُكُمۡ وَأَوۡلَٰدُكُمۡ فِتۡنَةٞ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عِندَهُۥٓ أَجۡرٌ عَظِيمٞ
translation: Know that your wealth and your children[16] are only a trial and that with Allah is an immense reward.
footnotes: [16] Due to your love for both of them, you may violate Allah’s commands concerning them.
